JobTitle: Product Designer, MAPBU Services Strategy - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: About UsReady to build? So are we. Come join VMware’s new and exciting Modern Applications Platform Business Unit (MAPBU) team, made up of products and services under the Tanzu portfolio to help customers build, run and manage their most important applications. To learn more about Tanzu watch thisvideo. #TeamTanzuYouYou have strong product design instincts, and an appreciation for and understanding of lean, agile and user-centered design values, principles, and practices. You are excited by the mission and organizational value that technology can unlock. You thrive in a complex ecosystem, collecting, sharing, and synthesizing input from many directions and enabling your organization to continuously deliver customer value. You love working with effective teams and driving excellence in practice. You are inspired by the opportunity to help customers and partners modernize their in-house software development capabilities. You bring humility, empathy, and a learning mindset to everything you do. You believe in doing the right thing and doing what works.  What you’ll be doingYou will be working on the VMware Tanzu Labs Services Strategy team. You’ll help manage our Services Portfolio, and continuous improvement of it based on learnings. You’ll apply your skills in lean UX methodologies, as well as Product Discovery, to the work of ensuring our Services Portfolio has strong market fit. You’ll pair closely with Product Management to manage services through their lifecycle, identifying needs for new services as well as signals that services are no longer valuable. You’ll continuously mine insights from actual engagements delivered by the Services Delivery organization that are relevant for the improvement of the Tanzu product portfolio, and share these insights back with the Product organization. Primarily, you’ll be responsible for ensuring we have a strong system in place for Solution Discovery, which means that we have access to insights from the market and our customers to inform how we evolve how we solve for high-value customer needs in the most efficient way. You will be responsible forSolution discovery. Working with teams to discover customer problems, and create valuable, desirable and feasible solutions. Ensuring we have strong feedback loops between sellers, services delivery, customers, partners, and the product team. Working closely with Product Management to ensure that the signals are pulled from the “noise” and acted on, and inform the right backlogs. Ensuring we have a strong system in place for this, and that it successfully scales. Enablement. Ensuring that we are effectively training people-- on-staff consultants, partners-- to successfully deliver services, ensuring sellers are effectively prepared to sell them, and applying a user-centered approach to how we iterate. This involves strong partnership with a number of teams, internally. Communications: Ensuring those stakeholders who stand to benefit from learnings through Solution Discovery-- particularly, but not exclusively, members of Product & Services-- are always aware of important patterns and insights, and are creating experiments to act on them as needed. Creating transparency with respect to what we do. Required Skills & Experience:5-8 years Software Product Design or similar experience, shipping products to users (enterprise or large-scale consumer
